events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle colliding with a tree at a low speed.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident based on the reported collision details received earlier.
An agent with experience in vehicle accident claims was assigned to handle the customer's case promptly.
The customer was formally acknowledged regarding the receipt and acceptance of their automobile collision claim.
The agent requested additional documents including the police report, vehicle damage photos, and insurance policy details.
The customer promptly submitted all requested documents, including detailed images of the damaged vehicle and the accident report.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence to verify the circumstances of the vehicle accident.
After thorough evaluation, the investigation concluded that the customer's claim is valid with no discrepancies found.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on estimated repair costs and policy coverage limitations.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and thanked the agent for timely communication.
The insurance claim was approved by the management team, authorizing payment for vehicle repairs.
The settlement amount was successfully transferred to the customer’s account to cover the repair expenses.
The claim was officially closed after payment issuance and confirmation that the customer’s issue was resolved.
